thread.section_title: Hotel Pas de Calais - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely little hotel in perfect situation
thread.title_full: Lovely little hotel in perfect situation - Review of Hotel Pas de Calais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: John B
title: Lovely little hotel in perfect situation
text: We went for two days to go to an art exhibition. We were upgraded to a superior room, which by Paris standards was large, and it was comfortable and well-equipped, and quiet being on the inside of the hotel. The staff were very friendly and pretended to understand my french although I heard them speaking very good english to other guests. The situation is excellent, near a metro station and within walking distance of the Louvre, Orangerie and Musee D'Orsay, not to mention Notre Dame. Will go again.
